rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with a foyer that adheres to Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow.
Open living space for family gatherings; large windows for natural light; designed keeping eco-friendly materials and Vastu alignments.
Well-lit dining area adjacent to the kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and Vastu-friendly layout.
Modern eco-kitchen design using sustainable materials; includes a pantry; positioned according to Vastu guidelines.
Master bedroom with attached bathroom, natural lighting and ventilation; designed for restful sleep in compliance with Vastu norms.
Bedroom designed for family members; ample storage and eco-friendly fixtures.
Dedicated space for domestic help including a small kitchenette and living area, in accordance with local building norms.
Cozy library space for reading and study; designed to ensure quiet ambiance while adhering to Vastu guidelines for knowledge and creativity.

openings.description: Main entrance door placed according to Vastu principles ensuring positive energy entry.
Energy-efficient windows installed in all rooms for natural lighting and ventilation; designed following eco-friendly standards.
